name: Union Pétrolière Européenne Indépendante
goal:
The function of UPEI within Europe is:

to ensure equitable trading conditions for our members
to promote a competitive market
to encourage efficiency of oil supply, retailing and consumption
to represent the views of our members to legislative bodies
to secure equal and equitable treatment for our members in the formulation of laws and regulations (taxes, security stock regulations, quality standards, biofuel mandates etc.)
to increase the diversity of supply by region and supplier
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Energy Union
- Low carbon economy
- Energy Efficiency
- Fuels Quality Directive (Art.7a)
- Energy taxation
- Renewable Energy Directive
- Biofuels
- Compulsory Oil Stocks
- Heating oil
- Transport:
decarbonisation, fuel labelling, petrol vapor recovery, sustainable transport, urban mobility, deployment of alternative fuels infrastructure
- Fuel cards
